conversation.content: I'm calling about order number 7834-JK. It shows delivered yesterday at 2:47 PM, but I never received it.
Thank you for contacting us. I apologize for this situation. Let me pull up order 7834-JK right away and review the delivery details to determine what happened.
I've been home all day yesterday and today. No package was left at my door or mailbox.
I understand your concern. According to our system, the driver marked it delivered to 4827 Oak Ridge Drive at 2:47 PM yesterday afternoon. Can you confirm this is your correct address?
Yes, that's my address. I've checked everywhere including behind bushes and with my neighbors.
Certainly.
I have security camera footage from yesterday. There was no delivery driver at my property at that time.
That's very helpful information. I'm filing an investigation report under case number INV-98234-XM. Our logistics team will review the GPS data from the driver's scanner within 24 hours.
What happens if they can't locate the package? This was a $450 purchase.

I completely understand your concern about this valuable order. We have several resolution options available. Once investigation INV-98234-XM is complete, we can either send a replacement immediately or issue a full refund.
How long will the investigation take? I need these items for a presentation next Tuesday.
The investigation typically completes within 24 to 48 hours. However, given your Tuesday deadline, I'm escalating this to priority status right now under expedite code EXP-7734.
If you send a replacement, can you guarantee it arrives before Tuesday?
Absolutely. I can process a replacement order today with overnight shipping at no additional charge. It would ship from warehouse facility 382 tonight and arrive Monday by 10:30 AM.
That would work. Can you send me written confirmation of this arrangement?
Of course. I'll send detailed confirmation to your email address on file within the next 15 minutes. The email will include your case number INV-98234-XM and replacement order details.
I also want to ensure I'm not charged twice if the original package appears.
That's already handled. I've placed a hold on any duplicate charges using protection code FIN-8829-PP. If the original arrives, you can keep it with our apologies for the inconvenience.
Thank you. Please confirm my email address before sending the documentation.
Your confirmation will be sent to the address ending in @techcorp.com that we have on file. You'll also receive tracking information once the replacement ships tonight from distribution center 382.

scenario: reporting that their delivery was marked complete but never arrived
